message: When loan transactions make their way into your practice as a non-finance attorney, how do you navigate them? Jake Rheaume is here to help. In this webinar, he walks you through when you might encounter loan documents in your practice, how to analyze common loan documents, and how to help your borrower clients.
Understanding Loan Transactions for the Non-Finance Attorney begins promptly at 4 p.m. ET/1 p.m. PT on Friday, March 8, 2024.
bottomline: Seats are limited, so reserve yours today!
message3: Please note: This presentation is approved for one hour of General CLE credit in California, Texas, North Carolina, and South Carolina (all levels).
If you want to earn CLE credit for your attendance at this webinar, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

message: Even as a non-finance attorney, running into loan documentation is not out of the question. Is your client buying a home? Obtaining an SBA loan? Making an investment? How do you handle these documents? Join us for a guided tour of loan transactions and how to handle them with ease to make your practice a breeze.

Youâ€™re invited to join guest speaker Jake Rheaume as he shares tips and tricks on how non-finance attorneys can approach loan documentation and enhance their practice. Understanding Loan Transactions for the Non-Finance Attorney begins promptly at 4 p.m. ET/1 p.m. PT on Friday, March 8, 2024.
